transpbrr 0.1.0
  • Get started

  • News

Download Transferencia

download_transf.Rd

Download Transferencia

download_transf(ym = NULL, ...)

Arguments

ym

character year-month, see examples.
...

additional parameters

Value

a data.table containing the data

See also

Other Despesas Publicas: download_exec_desp()

Examples


(x <- download_transf(ym = "201401"))
#>        ano_/_mes                tipo_transferencia
